Class Invoice

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.washington.ext.Invoice

  • public class Invoice
extends java.lang.Object
    Invoice The Invoice is a collection of InvoiceItems.
    Author:
    christurner

      Invoice(InvoiceItem... args)

    • Method Summary

      void addItem(InvoiceItem InvoiceItem)

        Returns:
        - it returns the Arraylist of items.

      • addItem

        public void addItem(InvoiceItem InvoiceItem)
        Adds an InvoiceItem to the invoice, also tests to see if the item (any part) is null, if so, it throws the IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        InvoiceItem - - A single invoiceItem to be added to the invoice

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem(InvoiceItem InvoiceItem)
        This removes an item from the arraylist of invoice items.
        Parameters:
        InvoiceItem - - what item to remove

      • setInvoiceDiscount

        public void setInvoiceDiscount(double discountRate)
        This set the invoice discount rate for the entire invoice, if there is not already an item with a discount. It throws an error if the discount is set to a negative number.
        Parameters:
        discountRate - - what the invoice discount is set to.

      • getInvoiceDiscount

        public double getInvoiceDiscount()
        This method returns the invoice discount
        Returns:
        - the invoice discount.

      • processInvoice

        public void processInvoice()
                    throws DiscountException
        This prints out the details for each item in the invoice.
        Throws:
        DiscountException - - It throws an error if an item does have an existing discount.
